Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow space nuts!

I am not exactly sure if this is the prefix for it, or perhaps it may be out of place entirely, but I felt I needed to start somewhere with this wonderful subdivision of the community.

I am working on a new Grand Tour mission, and would like to work with someone on this subforum to document it. I have seen several fantastic Grand Tour storylines on here, but I think that we could be mutually beneficial to each other in that I would give the writer real images and drama to draw from. I think it could be a fun project to partner with someone on. Let me know if you are interested!

Make it a great day!

I'd be happy to help you, those damn finals always get in the way.

Good luck anyway.
I'm basically done with exams now (one left, but that ain't a problem) so sure I could help! Just let me know what you need me to do.
